channel.title: Posts on Stephan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Stephan's Blog

item.title: The story of Windy and Warm
item.description: For quite some while ago, actually the very beginning of playing fingerstyle(or kinda) I've heard an impressive song which means till today a lot to me. It's an catchy tune with an easy but at the same time unique melody. I think there is for all of us only a few songs which we like to listen to even after years. For me Windy and Warm is definitely one of those.
